dimensions: Warp x Weft: 142.2 x 130.3 cm (56 x 51 5/16 in.)
title: Textile
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave with brocading in chenille yarns
description: Fabric designed by Alexander Morton, inspired by Sardinian peasant embroideries. Design of falconers on horseback, reindeer, hunters, flowering trees, etc., in brilliant polychrome chenille yarns on a dark brown cotton ground, with white floral vine borders on each selvedge edge and down the center.
